description: NaturalReader: Free Text to Speech for Online, Mobile App, Commercial license and Education with AI voices.
title: AI Voices - NaturalReader Home
introduction: NaturalReader is an AI Text to Speech tool trusted by 10 million users. It offers features like AI Text to Speech, Voice Cloning, and supports PDF and 20+ formats. The tool provides 50+ languages and 200+ AI voices, including multi-lingual voices powered by Large Language Models (LLM). It also includes enhanced assistive technology and content-aware AI voices for a more natural delivery.
features: Support for 50+ languages and 200+ AI voices

faqs.question: What is NaturalReader?
faqs.answer: NaturalReader is an AI Text to Speech tool that allows any type of text to be read aloud with natural AI voices.

faqs.question: How many languages and voices does NaturalReader support?
faqs.answer: NaturalReader supports 50+ languages and 200+ AI voices, including multi-lingual voices powered by Large Language Models (LLM).

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available for NaturalReader?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free trial available for NaturalReader.
